title.romaji: Ponkotsu Fuuki Iin to Skirt take ga Futekisetsu na JK no Hanashi
title.native: ポンコツ風紀委員とスカート丈が不適切なJKの話

media.description:
Sakuradaimon is the school's prefect. A prefect is a student who is authorized to enforce discipline. As a prefect, he's supposed to be a role model to other students, but unfortunately he's not perfect. Kohinata is one of the people who Sakuradaimon has tried to discipline into wearing appropriate school attire, but she has thusfar been disobedient.

And so this is a story of the two interacting with one another.

title.romaji: Watashi no Shiawase na Kekkon (Shinsaku Anime)
title.native: わたしの幸せな結婚 (新作アニメ)

media.description:
New anime project for Watashi no Shiawase na Kekkon.

Note: Title and relations are provisional and subject to change.
media.hashtag: #わたしの幸せな結婚 #わた婚アニメ

title.native: 春夏秋冬代行者 春の舞

media.description:
Once upon a time, there was Winter. Winter was once the only season in the world—but such an existence was too lonely to bear, and so it created Spring to love. Before long, the earth wished for more time to rest in the cycle, and Summer and Autumn were born. The ones who carry the cycle are called the Agents of the Four Seasons. Hinagiku, the Vernal Agent, disappeared from this land ten years ago, taking the season of spring with her. Now, after incredible hardship, she has returned to restore the cycle to its proper state—and, as in the myth passed down since the dawn of time, she sends her love to Winter.

(Source: Yen Press)

title.native: デート・ア・ライブ (新プロジェクト)

media.description:
A new project for Date A Live.

Note: Title and Relations are provisional and will be updated when more info is announced.

media.description: Music video for the "superhuman share house story" Charisma House's song Charisma Picnic, also theme of the project's 2nd season.
media.hashtag: #カリスマピクニック #カリピク #カリスマ

title.romaji: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken: Steel Ball Run
title.native: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 スティール・ボール・ラン

media.description: The seventh story arc of the long-running JoJo's Bizarre Adventure series.

title.native: 天幕のジャードゥーガル

media.description:
In the harem of the Khan, wisdom is beauty.

The time: the thirteenth century. The place: Yeke Mongol Ulus, the greatest empire the world has ever known. The woman: Fatima, hailing from Persia, where medical technique and scientific knowledge have been perfected beyond all precedent.

Fatima's desire for a stage where she can put all her knowledge to work has brought her to the palace of the Mongols, where she falls under the wing of Töregene, the sixth wife of Ögedei, the second Great Khan—a mighty woman with complicated feelings about the direction of the empire. These two women are the axle upon which the politics of the palace, and soon the very world, will turn...

(Source: Yen Press)

title.native: ひな菊の人生

media.description:
“Daisy's Life” follows the emotional journey of a six-year-old girl named Daisy, who loses her mother in a tragic accident and struggles to adapt to life with her aunt. One sleepless night, she encounters a mysterious girl named Dahlia at her window. Their days together begin to transcend time and space, bringing a cosmic perspective to Daisy's modest life in a downtown yakisoba restaurant.

(Source: Variety)

title.native: 熱風

media.description: Music video for the song "Neppuu" by kemu. This music video celebrates the 4th anniversary of the Project SEKAI COLORFUL STAGE! feat. Hatsune Miku mobile game.

title.romaji: Entotsu-machi no Poupelle: Yakusoku no Tokei-dai
title.native: えんとつ町のプペル 〜約束の時計台〜

media.description: Sequel to Entotsu-machi no Poupelle.

title.native: カナン様はあくまでチョロい

media.description:
A beautiful and alluring devil that devours human souls has descended…

Kanan, the "Gourmet Devil", descends upon a high school in the human world to devour young, sweet souls, and her first sacrifice is Youji Kyougi: "It's a high privilege to be devoured by yours truly. Be thankful, inferior creature."

However… For some reason, she and Kyougi end up making a romantic contract?! For the innocent Kanan, who has lived for thousands of years without experiencing first love, every day is filled with excitement! Going home together?! Holding hands?! Going on dates?! A first time?!?!?!?!

"You damn inferior creature—!"

The first-love rom-com about a cute and simple-minded devil begins♪

(Source: Official Site, translated)

title.native: キングダム 第6シリーズ

media.description: The sixth season of Kingdom.

title.native: Sunny

media.description: The story of an orphanage, the children who live in it, and the beat-up old Nissan Sunny 1200 which provides them with a means of escape from their boring everyday lives.

title.native: 左

media.description:
A skilled carpenter/sculptor Jingoro, gets set up by his disciples and loses his right arm and his father in an "accident" during the reconstruction of the Edo Castle. A few decades later… Jingoro is continuing his journey of revenge with his partner “Sleeping Cat” and his weaponized prosthetic arm. People have come to call him Jingoro "Hidari," which means "left" in Japanese.

Jingoro defeats all the foes that has betrayed him, but he learns that Tokugawa Shogunate was behind the murderous event. He searches for clues on who was behind the whole set up, and fights with an army of mechanical soldiers along the way. Finally he confronts the mastermind behind all the killings, but first, he must save the city of Edo by stopping the Edo Castle, now turned into a gigantic weapon of mass destruction!

(Source: Official Website)

title.native: カリスマジャンボリー

media.description: Music video for the "superhuman share house story" Charisma project's song Charisma Jamboree, also the title of their 2nd album.
media.hashtag: #カリスマジャンボリー #カリスマ

title.romaji: Okiraku Ryoushu no Tanoshii Ryouchi Bouei
title.native: お気楽領主の楽しい領地防衛

media.description:
At the age of two, Van, the fourth son of a marquis, recovered the memories of a previous life. He was becoming a child prodigy, but at the age of 8, he was found to have "production magic". In a world where offensive magic was considered superior, it was a "useless" aptitude.

His disappointed father thought that Van was not fit to be a nobleman, and Van was banished to become the lord of a nameless remote village with only his personal maid, Till. It was a desolate village with a population of only a hundred people and no local specialties, and it was on the verge of extinction. Van, seeing the situation, decided live a quiet life and develop the village with his knowledge from his previous life and his production magic, even though it was considered "useless." He not only equipped adventurers and built houses, but he also built a huge castle and even deployed ballistas for defense! The nameless frontier village was soon transformed into a huge city! A fantasy adventure of an exiled young reincarnated nobleman running a carefree domain is about to begin!

(Source: Bookwalker, translated)

title.native: 今日は指輪を外すから……

media.description: "Yeah, you're doing well. You've grown up." Shinsuke is praised by his admired senior Miyuki. He was carefully trained from the time he was a new employee, encouraged by her consideration, admired and had feelings for her. Recently, she has been working remotely from home, and meetings are held over the internet. He was happy to get a glimpse of her home, but what he saw on the screen when he forgot to turn it off... Shinsuke, seeing her in a shameless state that would be bad if anyone knew about it, takes his married senior to the hotel, overwriting her as if he's tearing her apart. Miyuki, overflowing without resistance as if she's given up, is absorbed in their fleeting intercourse as if she's lost herself. What happens to them is...

title.native: 淫モラル・ゲームマスター THE ANIMATION

media.description:
A young boy, Mario, is asked by his father, who works for a video game company, to become the GM. Although he is not keen, as a result of his analysis, he realizes that he can experience the same stimulation he received in the game in real life, and as an experiment, he sets his sights on a quiet girl named Koharu Takashina. Koharu wishes to become “a useful and gorgeous character,” which is the opposite of reality. However, the class she is given is that of a prostitute! After being raped by a rough man, her womb starts tingling, even though she is still a virgin in real life...

(Source: PinkPineapple, translated)

title.native: けっかおーらい

media.description:
Music video directed and animated by Saitei Yasai Corner for the song Kekka Alright by Kocchi no Kento.

Note: The song featured in this music video also serves as the opening theme of the anime My Hero Academia: Vigilantes.

title.native: トナリノカノジョ

media.description:
Kyouko brags about being scouted by her childhood friend Souji's favorite gravure idol. Souji gets angry and rejects her, but one day, he receives a video. It shows Kyouko in a risque swimsuit, taking on her first gravure shoot! In the video, she is at the mercy of the staff, and eventually she moans while saying Souji's name, being defiled by the hands of a stranger. What will Souji think of this...!?

(Source: Lune-soft, translated)

title.native: ヨゴレタカノジョ

media.description:
Since the shocking gravure photo shoot, Kyouko has become strangely seductive, and Souji has also changed... The two have become lovers, and one day Souji invites his friend Segawa to Kyouko's house for study purposes, but Souji sneaks out saying he has something to do. When they are alone, Kyouko actively invites Segawa out! Souji spies on Kyouko and Segawa getting wild with a hidden camera in the room...?

(Source: Lune-soft, translated)

title.romaji: "Omae Gotoki ga Maou ni Kateru to Omou na" to Yuusha Party wo Tsuihou Sareta node, Outo de Kimama ni Kurashitai
title.native: 「お前ごときが魔王に勝てると思うな」と勇者パーティを追放されたので、王都で気ままに暮らしたい

media.description:
Flum Apricot was never meant to be a hero. Despite zero stats across the board and a power she can’t even use, she somehow finds herself included in a party of heroes. But Flum’s life hits rock bottom when the party’s renowned sage, Jean Inteige, decides that the useless girl is dead weight, and arranges to have her sold into slavery. Tossed to monsters to be feasted upon for her master’s entertainment, Flum makes the desperate choice to reach for a cursed weapon…and something new awakens within her. A grimdark tale about one woman’s blood-soaked quest to reclaim her life!

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
media.hashtag: #おまごとアニメ化 #おまごと

title.romaji: LUPIN THE IIIRD: Zenigata to Futari no Lupin
title.english: LUPIN THE IIIRD: Zenigata and the Two Lupins
title.native: LUPIN THE IIIRD 銭形と2人のルパン

media.description:
Prequel to Lupin the IIIrd the Movie: Fujimi no Ketsuzoku.

An airport bombing terror attack occurs in the frigid Roviet Union.
The unexpected suspect is Lupin III.
However, the "other Lupin" cornered by Zenigata claims his innocence.
Zenigata, a man of justice, finds himself confronted by the mysterious "fake Lupin."
A national conspiracy, the truth behind the bombing, and the intersection of two Lupins -- Zenigata's beliefs are put to the test.

The most rugged, passionate and melancholy buddy action movie in the series' history begins!

(Source: Official Website, translated)

title.romaji: IDOLiSH7: First BEAT! Gekijou Soushuu-hen - Kouhen

media.description: This story is about Shinonome Hajime, an adventurer of Silver Range. He's dedicated to fulfilling missions from the guild. One day when completing a quest for monster meat, he finds a strange girl named Lily in a dungeon who's far more trouble than she's worth. Saving the girl from certain death, her story reminds him of his similar past and he takes her under his care...

title.native: カリスマ・イン・ダ・ハウス

media.description: Music video for the "superhuman share house story" project Charisma song Charisma In Da House, included in their 2nd album, Charisma Jamboree.

title.native: Sham'ing

media.description: Music video animated by Riri Yamashita for the original song Sham'ing by fictional band EROSION.

title.native: 好色の忠義くノ一ぼたん

media.description:
"I'd like to borrow Botan for a while." Botan is a female ninja about to get married. She is asked by her uncle, who is also a benefactor, to help support the declining samurai estate and her beloved lord. As invited and ordered by her uncle, she hides from the master she should be serving and lets her small body be violated. Despite her reason, which she sees as a duty, her body inevitably responds to the pleasure...

(Source: Mediabank, translated)

title.native: 新星ギャルバース

media.description:
Zero crash-lands on the war-torn planet Amatera with no memories and no idea who she is. Amidst a brutal conflict between the local resistance and the imperial Gevuran forces, she meets Ring, a charismatic young leader fighting to save the world. As Zero’s identity slowly awakens, she discovers she’s no ordinary girl—she’s a cosmic being known as Galverse, a key to something far greater than any one planet.

Note: The project was initially funded through a digital art initiative connected to the Galverse NFT collection.

title.native: うるわしの宵の月

media.description:
Yoi Takiguchi has long legs, a deep voice, and a handsome face…in other words, Yoi is such a good-looking guy that most people don’t notice or care that she is, in fact, a girl. Indeed, she’s had the nickname “Prince” as long as she can remember. That is, until she met Ichimura-senpai…the only person who’s really seemed to see her for herself. To her surprise, she’s not sure how to handle this new relationship, especially when her newfound friend is a prince himself (and a guy prince, at that).

(Source: Kodansha USA)

title.native: ディストーションと抱擁

media.description: Music video directed by Riri Yamashita for the song Distortion to Houyou by Fuwa Minato.

title.romaji: Akai Kitsune Midori no Tanuki Web CM: Hitori no Yoru to Akamidori
title.native: 赤いきつね 緑のたぬきウェブCM: ひとりのよると赤緑

media.description:
Web advertisements for Maruchan's Akai Kitsune & Midori no Tanuki brand instant noodles.

Episode 1: Ouchi Drama-hen (おうちドラマ編)
I feel relieved when the “dashi” tastes good.
A cold winter night. Alone at home, the drama reaches its climax.

Episode 2: Houkago Sensei-hen (放課後先生編)
I feel relieved when the “dashi” tastes good.
It is snowing in midwinter, after school at a certain school.

(Source: YouTube, translated)

title.native: Imprisoned XII

media.description: Music video directed by Mimei Aoume for the song Imprisoned XII by Ave Mujica.

title.romaji: Heroine? Seijo? Iie, All Works Maid desu (Ko)!
title.native: ヒロイン？聖女？いいえ、オールワークスメイドです（誇）！

media.description:
“I will become the world’s most wonderful maid!”

With her skirt fluttering in black and white, the girl shouted. Her name is Melody. A reincarnated former Japanese girl, she now pursues her dream in her new life, working as an all-purpose maid for a poor count’s family in the kingdom of Théolas. When she makes it, even cheap tea turns into a luxury brew, and a dilapidated mansion is quickly restored to new! Cleaning, serving, hunting, DIY—leave it all to her and her powerful magic. Unbeknownst to Melody, this world is actually an otome game, and she is the most powerful and invincible heroine, the saint! Yet, she remains oblivious to this fact. Romance with handsome men? Attacks by the Demon Lord? Work comes first! A fantasy of misunderstood work that unknowingly shatters destiny!

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)

title.romaji: Jishou Akuyaku Reijou na Konyakusha no Kansatsu Kiroku.
title.native: 自称悪役令嬢な婚約者の観察記録。

media.description:
Because Prince Cecil is extraordinarily intelligent, life is boring for him. His days are without much excitement, but he becomes engaged to Bertia, the daughter of a marquis. The first thing she says to him when they first meet is quite baffling. She claims she is the "villainous heroine" in the story of his life!! According to Bertia, she has memories of her previous life. In a certain "romance game" she played in her life before, she played the character of the "villainess." Her purpose in her new life is to become an exemplary villainess and ruin the prince's engagement. In order to achieve this goal, Bertia does one outrageous thing after another and brings chaos and confusion into his life. A unique "love" story with a twist!!

(Source: Alpha Manga)

title.english: JUJUTSU KAISEN: Hidden Inventory / Premature Death – The Movie
title.native: 劇場版総集編 呪術廻戦 懐玉・玉折

media.description:
"The strongest duo—A youth they can never return to."

Compilation film of Jujutsu Kaisen 2nd Season's "Kaigyoku・Gyokusetsu" (Hidden Inventory / Premature Death) arc.

Before they were enemies, Satoru Gojo and Suguru Geto were high school classmates and friends. The two most powerful sorcerers are tasked with protecting Riko Amanai, a student who has been designated to be sacrificed as the Star Plasma Vessel, until she can fulfill her duty. Pursued by a religious cult and other curse users, they are the only sorcerers capable of carrying out such a difficult task – but this mission will set their destinies, and challenge the two sorcerers in ways unimaginable.

(Source: GKIDS)

title.native: 劇場版総集編 呪術廻戦 懐玉・玉折 劇場版じゅじゅさんぽ

media.description: A new mini anime short that screens alongside the Jujutsu Kaisen: Kaigyoku・Gyokusetsu compilation film.
media.hashtag: #じゅじゅさんぽ  #呪術廻戦 #懐玉・玉折

title.romaji: Android wa Keiken Ninzuu ni Hairimasu ka??
title.native: アンドロイドは経験人数に入りますか？？
ノモの国

media.description:
Once upon a time, there was a girl named “Sora”. She loved to sing, but one day, something happened that made her scared to sing in front of others. As days passed, she forgot how to sing, and even how to laugh. Then, one day, she and her little brother “Daichi” stumbled upon a mysterious pond.

At a pond called “Kagamiike”: Mirror Pond, Sora discovered a mystical butterfly glowing with aurora colors. As she watched it flutter freely, she suddenly felt a connection. The butterfly’s magical glow seemed to resonate with something deep inside her. Unable to resist, Sora reached out toward the butterfly. But she lost her balance and tumbled headfirst into the pond. Daichi, trying to help her, ended up falling in too...

Beyond the surface of the Mirror Pond, a world of wonder and mystery awaited. As Sora and Daichi stared in amazement, a quirky girl named “Rococo” appeared before them. Before long, the three of them set off on an adventure through “The Land of NOMO”. Along the way, Sora begins to face the many feelings she had kept hidden deep within her heart.

(Part of Panasonic Group Pavilion project for Expo 2025).

title.native: 綺麗事

media.description:
Music video directed by Makoto Katou for the song Kireigoto by Hoshimachi Suisei.

Note: The music video was pre-screened in the "SUISEI ARCHIVES" exhibition at PARCO FACTORY Ikebukuro starting on May 16, 2025 before its release on Suisei's YouTube channel on May 19, 2025.

media.description: Music video directed by kouko for the song SPEED by natori.

title.romaji: Gakkou de wa Oshiete Kurenai Taisetsu na Koto

ちびぜんじ先生 居残り講義録

media.description: Mini anime for Chuuzenji-sensei Mononoke Kougiroku: Sensei ga Nazo wo Hodoite Shimau kara. released on YouTube.

title.native: トリツカレ男

media.description:
The story centers on a young man named Giuseppe, who is called "Toristukare Otoko" by the townspeople because once he gets absorbed in something, he cannot look at anything else. One day, he falls in love at first sight with a girl selling balloons named Pechka. He goes crazy and tries to get closer to Pechka, but she has a sadness in her heart and... For the sake of his beloved Pechyka, Giuseppe and his partner, the mouse Cielo, secretly solve her worries by using the many tricks he has been obsessed with.

(Source: Crunchyroll News, edited)

title.native: お買いものパンダ！(ONA)

media.description: Streaming exclusive episodes of Okaimono Panda!.

title.native: テンカイチ　日本最強武芸者決定戦

media.description:
This is not history as we know it. The year is 1600. Ten years have passed since Oda Nobunaga unified the whole of Japan. When Nobunaga realizes he is nearing the end of his life, he announces that he will hand over the reins of power to whoever brings him the strongest warrior. The generals, whose dreams of conquering the country had been crushed, put up their own strongest warriors and aim to become the king of the country!

(Source: Kodansha USA)

title.native: 社畜シンデレラ
寝取られた爆乳妻たち

media.description:
Episode 1 - Melting Under My Nephew's Touch
Hitomi, a full-time housewife, is worried that her relationship with her husband is not going well and they have not had a child. One day, her husband's nephew, who is staying with her, offers her a massage to cheer him up, and she gives in... Unable to tell her cold husband, Hitomi wriggles her voluptuous body and becomes immersed in the pleasure her nephew brings her. As her reason melts away, where will Hitomi's desires lead her...?

Episode 2 - My Wife's Side Job
Youko, in her third year of marriage, lives a modest yet energetic life while cultivating her love for her husband. In order to welcome a new family member with her beloved husband and to support the family, Youko starts working as a housekeeper. The client is a young, younger company president who lives in a luxury apartment. While Youko is enthusiastically cleaning, she breaks a USB memory stick containing important data. As an apology, the young man asks her to play the role of his "wife" while doing the housekeeping. He takes advantage of her guilt and makes her sleep next to him in bed, but she forgives him... Unable to quit housekeeping to support her husband who earns little, Youko's voluptuous body and reason are eaten away by the animalistic sex of the younger, handsome celebrity. And when Youko decides to quit, what choice is presented to her...?

(Source: Mediabank, translated)

title.native: feel like

media.description: Music video directed by KURO for the song feel like by Eve.

title.native: クリームで会いにいけますか

media.description: A series of shorts showing the daily lives of the MyGO!!!!! members.

title.english: Marry Me, Let's Have a Baby!
title.native: デキちゃうまで婚

media.description:
At a speed-dating event, Taika hits it off with a woman named Ayano, a doctor who's eager to have children. However, just as the matching couples are about to be announced, he panics and makes a break for it when his fears about his erectile dysfunction begin to surface...

Later, at an appointment for his condition, Taika is shocked to discover that his doctor is none other than Ayano herself! On top of that, he realizes that when he's with Ayano, his erectile dysfunction disappears!

(Source: OceanVeil)

Note: Episode 1 receives an advanced distribution on AnimeFesta on June 13th, 2025. The start date reflects the start of the regular series broadcasting.

title.romaji: Tooi-san wa Seishun Shitai! "Baka to SmaPho to Romance to"
title.native: 遠井さんは青春したい！『バカとスマホとロマンスと』

media.description:
Tooi, an ordinary high school girl, was expecting a normal school life—until everything changed on her very first day.

After catching the attention of the unpredictable and overly energetic classmate Jel, she's suddenly roped into the mysterious "Youth Romance Club," a bizarre school group dedicated to chasing down anything that feels "youthful" or "romantic."

What should've been a carefree club quickly spirals into chaotic antics, with Tooi constantly playing the straight man to everyone's nonsense. To make things even wilder, the club's antics start getting streamed online!

Between laughter, unexpected twists, and even a mysterious incident, this unpredictable school life is just getting started.

title.native: Sランクパーティから解雇された【呪具師】

media.description:
Gail Hamilton is a "curse crafter" who got booted from his party for allegedly not pulling his weight...right after they were promoted to the Guild's "S" rank. Unfortunately, the party didn't realize that Gail's cursed goods pack the power of holy relics and legendary gear! But too bad for them, because Gail's going it alone now...and causing a sensation with the creepy-yet-useful curses he works with!

(Source: Kodansha)

title.romaji: Akuyaku Reijou no Naka no Hito
title.native: 悪役令嬢の中の人

media.description:
A girl who had reincarnated as Remilia, the villainess of an otome game tries to clear her name. However, the real Remilia who had been watching all along inside awakens.

Now it's time for the true villainess' revenge to begin!

(Source: Ichijinsha, translated)

title.romaji: Kono Hon wo Nusumu Mono wa
title.native: この本を盗む者は

media.description:
Descended from a long line of book collectors, high school student Mifuyu is surrounded by books in every aspect of her life. Her great-grandfather established the famous Mikura Hall, a library in the heart of town, and even the townspeople are all avid readers. There’s just one problem—Mifuyu hates books! But when a thief in Mikura Hall triggers an ancient curse, she’s left with no choice but to reclaim the stolen books herself…by entering the very stories she despises! With the help of the mysterious Mashiro, will she be able to restore her great-grandfather’s collection and save her town from a magical doom?

(Source: Yen Press)

title.romaji: Let’s Play: Quest Darake no My Life
title.native: Let’s Play クエストだらけのマイライフ

media.description:
Samara “Sam” Young is a developer in Los Angeles who’s about to achieve her dreams with her first video game, Ruminate. That is, until a popular streamer gives the game a scathing review. Even worse, Sam finds out the troublesome critic is now her new neighbor! Get lost in a comedic, romantic, and all-too-real story about gaming, memes, and social anxiety. Come for the plot, stay for the doggo.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.native: 綺麗にしてもらえますか。

media.description:
With an endearing protagonist and luscious art, this seaside slice-of-life story offers tranquility in the chaos of the modern world. For two years, Wakana Kinme has run a laundry service in the seaside resort town of Atami, where she's built a fulfilling life making friends with the locals and visiting hot springs. Although Wakana has no knowledge of her own past, her cleaning services safeguard memories imbued in customers' precious items.

(Source: Square Enix Manga & Books)

title.native: FOXING: Kitsuné-tsuki (きつねつき)

media.description:
The story explores universal themes such as isolation, fantasy, and the confrontation of the self in contemporary society. It poetically and visually depicts the protagonist's emotional transformation as she journeys toward personal liberation.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title.romaji: Gacha wo Mawashite Nakama wo Fuyasu: Saikyou no Bishoujo Gundan wo Tsukuriagero
title.native: ガチャを回して仲間を増やす 最強の美少女軍団を作り上げろ

media.description:
For some reason, he was invited to another world after he rolled the gacha like he usually does.
The gacha from the social game is available in his trusted smartphone.
It was a convenient and cheat tool that can give out equipment and beautiful girl characters.
He now aims to create the world's strongest army of beautiful girls in another world.

パンどろぼう

media.description:
Kadokawa announced on June 9th, 2025 that Keiko Shibata's Pan Dorobou (Bread Thief) picture book will have an anime adaptation. The announcement did not reveal the anime's format. The picture books center on a piece of bread that also steals bread from bakeries in the city.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title.native: 本格レモンアニメ -196（#イチキューロク）

media.description: Commercial directed by Naoki Matsuura made for Suntory's -196 canned chu-hai drink.

title.native: ghost（仮）

media.description:
Everyone has a "ghost" in their hearts. It is a genuine feeling that is there but inexpressible. In this work, the girl Nike opposes the absurdity of the world in order to protect the "starry sky." This challenging work expresses Nike's solitude and heroism, and the subtleties of the heart as she interacts with others.

(Source: Bandai Namco Filmworks Press Release via Anime News Network)

title.native: グローエンブレイス

media.description: Music video directed by Tokito Satou for the song Glow Embrace by Shirakami Fubuki.

title.native: 鬼の花嫁

media.description:
A Japanese-style ayakashi Cinderella story! "You're the bride I've been searching for all this time." The ayakashi and humans coexist in harmony. The ayakashi, having superior abilities and beautiful appearances, sometimes find their partner among human women, making them their "bride". The bride, in exchange for bringing prosperity, receives absolute love from the ayakashi. Yuzu is constantly compared to her sister, a bride of a demon fox, and is resented by her family every day. One day, when Yuzu just couldn't take things anymore, a man appears before her on a bridge. This man is the most beautiful man Yuzu has ever seen... and he's calling her his wife?! "Just be quiet and let me hold you." The most powerful, "cold-hearted" ayakashi is pouring his heart out for Yuzu?!

(Source: MangaPlaza)

title.native: カリスマピザパーティー

media.description: Music video for the "superhuman share house story project" Charisma's song Charisma Pizza Party, which celebrates the franchise's third anniversary.
media.hashtag: #カリスマ #カリスマピザパ #カリスマ3周年

title.native: 鎧真伝サムライトルーパー
ちょろ・めす・でいず
コアラ絵日記

media.description:
The manga is about Koala who writes about daily life, whether it's good or bad, happy or sad, Koala treats every day as a precious day. Koala believes that today is a good day, and tomorrow will be a good day too.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title.native: 形

media.description: Music video directed by Nowoka for the song Katachi by ZUTOMAYO.

title.native: 愛してるゲームを終わらせたい

media.description:
The first step to winning the Love Game is saying “I love you.” So how do you lose? By admitting you’re in love!

Let the games begin! Since childhood, Yukiya Asagi and Miku Sakura have played the Love Game, where they try to fluster each other with a simple “I love you.” But after falling in love for real and refusing to admit it, neither of them can afford to lose this battle!

After leaving behind his image as a quiet nerd, Yukiya’s ready to break hearts and take names with the ultimate high school glow-up. Well, he’s really just got one girl in his sights - his best friend, Miku! Using her favorite shojo manga as his weapon, he’s ready to pin her to the wall and gaze at her with a perfect smolder. Will his moves get her heart racing?

(Source: Viz Media)
media.hashtag: #愛してるゲームを終わらせたい

title.romaji: Boku no Hero Academia THE MOVIE: YOU'RE NEXT - A Piece of Cake

media.description:
Second film of Bousei no Volicia film trilogy.

At the last stronghold of humanity, the Heavenly Crest (Astronomy) Club, Akio learns the fate of the world. Two pilots are needed to battle the two remaining Usurpers which are targeting the faded Fire of Life. During the battle against the second enemy, during the curse of happy times, the choice between the happy present and the future Akio must dedicate her soul to approaches.

(Source: Official Site, translated)

title.native: 入学傭兵

media.description:
At the age of eight, Ijin Yu lost his parents in a plane crash and became stranded in a foreign land, forced to become a child mercenary in order to stay alive. He returns home ten years later to be reunited with his family in Korea, where food and shelter are plenty and everything seems peaceful. But Ijin will soon learn that life as a teenager is a whole other feat of survival. With only one year of high school left, Ijin must master new tactics to maneuver his way around the schoolhouse battleground. Can he survive a year of high school? Or rather, will the school be able to survive him?

(Source: WEBTOONS)

title.romaji: Maou no Musume wa Yasashi Sugiru!!
title.native: 魔王の娘は優しすぎる!!

media.description:
"The Demon King Ariman" He reigns above all in hell. Together with powerful demons. He seeks to conquer the entire world.

However, the Demon King halted his world conquest for a certain troubling matter... His daughter, Dou, is too kind?

title.native: 無名の人生

media.description:
From birth to death, each person goes through life with a variety of nicknames, and sometimes derogatory. The story depicts the beautiful yet sorrowful life of the protagonist who, unintentionally, rises to the top, against a backdrop of problems we are facing today, such as elderly drivers, the dark side of the entertainment industry, the unknown deaths of young people, and war.

(Annecy Festival Website)

title.romaji: Kaguya-sama wa Kokurasetai: Otona e no Kaidan
title.native: かぐや様は告らせたい 大人への階段

media.description: TV special for Kaguya-sama wa Kokurasetai.

title.romaji: Aikatsu! Memorial Stage: Kagayaki no Unit Cup
title.native: アイカツ！メモリアルステージ ～輝きのユニットカップ～

media.description:
Compilation film of Aikatsu!'s 3rd Season's "Aikatsu Restaurant" episode (ep. 140), followed by the "Unit Cup" arc (eps. 136-138), also featuring new segments with commentary from Akari, Madoka, Juri and Sumire. A part of the 10th anniversary celebrations of the Akari Generation.

After an announcement that a "Unit Cup" will be held at Starlight Academy's middle school, the eight performing two-member units are as motivated as they can be. This time, the event's broadcast will also feature a special corner where the idols report on each other's true faces behind the scenes. Is it time for the idols to clash with each other more passionately than ever?! The curtain rises on the Unit Cup right here and now!

(Source: Official Website, translated)

title.native: カリスマさびら

media.description: Music video for Charisma's song Charisma Sabira , included in the project's third album, Charisma Gambo.

title.native: 危険な森 鬼ごっこ

media.description:
Based on the erotic doujin game by x-rabbit (えっくす・らびっと).

In a certain deep forest, there is a girl walking alone. Her name is Alps. And this is a dangerous forest where many terrible creatures lurk. But Alps is frightened and goes on her way. To save her sick sister, she continues to walk out of the forest with a medicinal herb in her hand. Alps is still walking, "Wait for me. Sister". However, the forest is not as sweet as one's determination. A big monkey in heat forced her to sow her seed, and a boar attacked her with his huge body. Furthermore, she also encounters a group of men of dubious character.... The lone, dainty girl is nothing but food for the beasts. What will be the fate of Alps?... Alps wanders through a dangerous forest to save her sister. Her white soft skin emerges in the dimly lit forest. The huge body of a boar, a big monkey in heat, rests on it. A glossy pink color emerges on her heated body.

(Source: Getchu, translated)

title.native: これってナ～ニ？
ピュアピュア ぺろぺろ プリンセス

media.description:
Based on the erotic game by DWARFSOFT.

Toshio is a 42-year-old single man whose hobby is visiting brothels. A woman who calls herself Iris suddenly appears in front of him and begs Toshio to teach her how to please a man! Toshio, who has an insatiable libido, has no way of refusing the offer, so he uses his skills to give Iris, who has no sexual knowledge whatsoever, a sex education! However, Iris' true identity is that of a princess from another world... Queen Cattleya appears, unable to bear to see the princess have fallen so completely!

(Source: Lune-soft, translated)

title.native: 永久のユウグレ
SHIBUYA♡HACHI 第4クール

media.description: Sequel to SHIBUYA♡HACHI Part 3.

title.romaji: Kizu darake Seijo yori Houfuku wo Komete
title.english: With Vengeance, Sincerely, Your Broken Saintess
title.native: 傷だらけ聖女より報復をこめて

media.description:
Lua is a saintess candidate who possesses the power of healing. But her ability had one flaw: she could only heal others by transferring their wounds onto herself. Because of this, others bullied her, calling her the "Fallen Saintess." But it didn't bother Lua because her best friend Arianne always stood up for her.

One day, Lua's crush, Commander Garrett, was on the brink of death from a beast attack. Lua healed him, which left her on the verge of death. When she woke up, she learned that all the credit was given to Arianne, and she finally saw her best friend's true color. Devastated, Lua is lost and helpless when the second prince appears in front of her with a tempting offer. What would happen to Lua as she begins her new life as a villainess?

(Source: NHN comico Corp.)
media.hashtag: #傷だらけ聖女より報復をこめて

title.native: ヴィジランテ -僕のヒーローアカデミア ILLEGALS- 第2期

media.description: The second season of Vigilante: Boku no Hero Academia ILLEGALS.

title.romaji: Haibara-kun no Tsuyokute Seishun New Game
title.native: 灰原くんの強くて青春ニューゲーム

media.description:
We all have embarrassing memories or deep regrets from high school, right? Socially anxious college senior Natsuki Haibara sure does. When he thinks back on that time of his life, all he has are fleeting fantasies of a happy adolescence that could have been. Imagine his bewilderment and surprise, then, when he inexplicably finds himself seven years in the past—one month before his first year of high school! Can Haibara avoid his previous mistakes, make his way to the top of the school social pyramid, and end up with the girl of his dreams? Or will he be forced to relive three years of solitude as the most hated guy in school? He’ll need all the help he can get in order to succeed, from a workout regimen to online how-to guides, a childhood friend, and plenty of sheer willpower. Watch as Haibara takes a second shot at his teenage years!

(Source: J-Novel Club)

title.native: エレキシード

media.description:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a…um…decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

(Source: WEBTOONS)

title.native: ハニーブロンド2

media.description:
Erina, a breastfeeding girl, is in love with Masaki, and Masaki can't live without Erina's breast milk. They both pass the entrance exams to college, and head straight to a love hotel in the middle of the day. After six months of abstinence, Masaki, who loves breast milk, goes crazy for Erina's breasts. The two perverts with strong sexual habits repeatedly seek each other and reach climax.

(Source: Mediabank, translated)

title.native: MUZIK TIGER In the Forest 第2期

media.description: Second season of Muzik Tiger In the Forest.

title.native: 迷宮のしおり

media.description:
One day, Shiori Maezawa, an ordinary high school girl, cracked her smartphone while falling down a staircase. As she wakes up, she finds herself in a deserted, parallel world that looks like Yokohama.

When she looks at her smartphone, she finds a photo of herself that she doesn't remember posting on social media. What’s the source of this mysterious post?

Will she be able to escape from this strange smartphone labyrinth?

(Source: Official Site, translated)

title.native: Project「M」

title.romaji: Monogatari Series: Off & Monster Season Shin Episode
title.native: 〈物語〉シリーズ オフ&モンスターシーズン 新エピソード

title.native: 伊藤潤二「クリムゾン」

media.description:
Crimson refers to the color crimson or bright red, and the concept of this volume is "monsters." This is a collection of horror stories that carefully selects masterpieces filled with unique madness, allowing you to immerse yourself in the eerie, bizarre, and yet original world of Junji Ito.

(Source: Official Website, translated)

title.native: bâan -大人の彊界-

media.description:
A story of two people in search of a new life, who leave their birthplaces - travelling to a whole different world trying to find a place where they truly belong. Set in the fictional world of Euthania, a land rich in nature with various magical races based on South East Asian Mythology, which is connected to Japan via a warp gate.

(Source: Official Trailer)

title.romaji: Gate Season 2: Jieitai Kanoumi nite, Kaku Tatakaeri
title.native: GATE SEASON2 自衛隊 彼の海にて、斯く戦えり

media.description: When Youki was reincarnated into a magical world, he became neither a hero nor a demon lord, but instead became a middle-level subordinate demon guarding the castle. When the Hero's party attacked the demon lord's castle, Youki was able to defeat them easily. But he fell in love at first sight with the beautiful cleric Cecelia!

title.native: 薬屋のひとりごと (続編)

media.description: Sequel to Kusuriya no Hitorigoto 2nd Season.

title.romaji: SUGAR SUGAR RUNE: Les deux sorcières
title.native: SUGAR SUGAR RUNE: Les deux sorcières

media.description: Short film commemorating the 20th Anniversary of Sugar Sugar Rune.

title.romaji: Akuyaku Reijou wa Ringoku no Outaishi ni Dekiai Sareru
title.native: 悪役令嬢は隣国の王太子に溺愛される

media.description:
On the day before her downfall, Lady Tiararose Lapis Clementille recalls that she is in an otome game that she had once played in her former life. She used to adore the main love interest Prince Hartknights Lapis-Lazuli Lactomuth, but unfortunately, she was not reincarnated as the heroine, but rather as is his worst enemy—the villainess fiancée.

At their graduation ceremony, without blinking an eye, Hartknights condemns Tiararose for alleged crimes, breaks off his engagement, and proclaims the heroine Akari as his new bride-to-be. No matter whether Tiararose is innocent, he banishes her from the kingdom. But before her sentence can be carried out, a shocking figure appears. Aquasteed Marineforest, the prince of a powerful neighboring country, has been harboring feelings for Tiararose for quite some time, and announces his intention to marry her!

Adored by the prince of another kingdom, what awaits the villainess on her path to a happy ending?

(Source: MAL Rewrite)

title.native: サイバーパンク: エッジランナーズ II

media.description:
Cyberpunk: Edgerunners 2 presents a new standalone 10-episode story from the world of Cyberpunk 2077— a raw chronicle of redemption and revenge.

When the world is blinded by spectacle, what extremes do you have to go to make your story matter?

(Source: Official Twitter)

title.native: 朱色の仮面

media.description: The mask causes disaster. The mask prefers slaughter. The mask has a will. A traveling mask merchant Pell who can create a mysterious mask that grants abilities. In a city with a gloomy atmosphere, I meet a mysterious girl, Sona ...!? The boy begins to walk at the end of publicity and self-discipline! Masked battle fantasy!

title.native: 黄泉のツガイ

media.description:
In a remote mountain village under the watchful eyes of two stone guardians, the young Yuru contentedly lives off the land while staying close to the only family he has left—Asa, his precious twin sister. Asa, meanwhile, carries out a mysterious “duty” on behalf of the village while locked in a cage. Why is Asa a prisoner? And what other secrets does Yuru’s otherwise idyllic home hide?

(Source: Square Enix)

title.native: ブラッククローバー 第2期

media.description: The second season of Black Clover.

title.romaji: 99-kai Danzai sareta Loop Reijou desu ga Konse wa "Chouzetsu Aisare Mode" desu tte!? Shin no Chikara ni Mezamete Hajimaru 100-kaime no Jinsei
title.native: 99回断罪されたループ令嬢ですが今世は「超絶愛されモード」ですって!? 〜真の力に目覚めて始まる100回目の人生〜

media.description:
Alphina is falsely accused of plotting to assassinate Saint Debonaire. Time rewinds every time she’s executed for a crime she didn’t commit, but with the cruel Saint Debonaire against her, the same fate awaits Alphina ninety-nine times in a row: death by decapitation. But something different happens the hundredth time around. Just as Alphina is preparing herself for yet another execution, she discovers that she can hear people’s true feelings—and that everyone secretly loves her! Can Alphina take advantage of her newfound ability and sidestep her fate at the guillotine?

(Source: J-Novel Club)

title.native: 一畳間まんきつ暮らし！

media.description:
A high school girl a manga cafe! Meiko, a countryside girl, enrolls in a rich girls' school. She is told that if she does volunteer work, her tuition will be free... but in reality, she will be living and working in a "manga cafe"!? Living in a small manga cafe booth turns out to be not so bad! Why not try enjoying a manga cafe filled with cute high school girls as staff?

(Source: Bookwalker, translated)

title.native: 運命の巻戻士

media.description:
The series follows Chrono, a 14-year-old boy who is a member of the Space-Time Police Special Forces Unit called the “Rewinders”. The organization uses its “Retry Eye” to save people who have already died, using future knowledge to repeatedly go back in time to get to a future where the victim is alive and well.

(Source: Crunchyroll News, edited)

title.native: 怪獣島

media.description:
Music video directed by Mana Inoue for the song Monster Island by WEDNESDAY CAMPANELLA.

Note: The song featured in this music video also serves as the opening theme of the anime Chibi Godzilla no Gyakushuu 3.

title.native: 炎の闘球女 ドッジ弾子

media.description:
The sequel to the legendary dodgeball manga Honou no Toukyuuji Dodge Danpei! In this modern version of the hot-blooded dodgeball story, Danpei's daughter, Danko, follows in his footsteps, struggling to build a dodgeball team with the strongest fighting spirit in the modern age of 2025! Can Danko overcome the apathetic attitude of today's world?

(Source: Corocoro, translated)

title.native: ゴーストアベニュー

media.description: Music video directed and animated by Marie Yasui for the song Ghost Avenue by Eve.

title.native: 死役所

media.description: A special animated short that released alongside the 20th tankoubon volume celebrating the manga reaching 100 chapters.
